name: Openwrt-piratebox-feed
tagline: Will contain a valid feed for OpenWRT build-environment
body:
--spacer--

Contains stuff for getting Makefiles for ipk via OpenWRT toolchain.


# cp  feeds.conf.default feeds.conf
# vi feeds.conf

add the following lines:

src-git piratebox git://github.com/PirateBox-Dev/openwrt-piratebox-feed.git


------------
Ressources:

http://wiki.openwrt.org/start

http://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/howto/build
http://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/howtobuild/single.package

### http://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/howto/buildroot.exigence

http://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/devel/feeds

http://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/devel/packages
http://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/techref/initscripts


old?? http://downloads.openwrt.org/docs/buildroot-documentation.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
